entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
